input.sentences: everyone was having a great time
mixing drinks and partying it up
they even played a few card games as well
output.sentences: It was a lovely Happy Christmas at the McCoys.
The McCoys told stories and sat around drinking hot cider.
Rick Sanchez McCoy was an excellent mixer and kept the spirits flowing.
Sterling Archer McCoy was voted Christmas King and had the honor of opening his presents first on Christmas morning.
Debbie Gallagher McCoy recounted the ballots in disbelief: adding 1,000 votes in her favor still didn't ensure victory.
